name: Scream Cube
description:
Scream Cube is a fun and interactive non tapping addictive game where your voice controls the note.

Make a lot of noise to force the note to run and jump or stay quiet to control the note moves slowly.

Get your high score for getting far in the game but be careful about the obstacles!

How to play?

- Don't make any noise to make the note stop
- Speak softly to make the note walk
- Scream to make the note jump

Features

- Move your note with your voice.
- Scream go and don't stop making your note move.
- Talk or make small sounds to make your note walk.

Let's begin to scream now and make your scream go note!
